thread.title: Japanese Patent Office Rules RealD Patent Valid
thread.title_full: Japanese Patent Office Rules RealD Patent Valid - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Japanese Patent Office Rules RealD Patent Valid
text:
RealD Inc.
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- In another decisive legal victory for RealD Inc. (NYSE: RLD), the Japanese Patent Office's Patent Reexamination Board ruled RealD's patent valid.
A challenge had been filed by MasterImage against one of RealD's Japanese patents protecting its award-winning XL light doubling technology. Following a trial, the Board upheld the validity of every claim in the patent.
The ruling is the latest victory upholding and affirming RealD patents around the world, and follow six similar wins -- five in the United States and one in Australia.
The patent challenged in Japan , JP5635773, is a member of a patent family that RealD has asserted against MasterImage in a proceeding pending before the US International Trade Commission. To date, MasterImage has failed to invalidate a single claim of a RealD invention patent.
RealD has a significant patent wall surrounding its light-doubling XL Cinema System with IP filings dating back to 2006 covering architecture and other aspects of the inventive technology. RealD's patents have been consistently affirmed in both examination and re-examination proceedings around the world.
Further information concerning RealD patents can be found at www.realdpatents.com .
About RealD Inc.
RealD is a leading global licensor of 3D and other visual technologies. RealD is the world's most widely used 3D technology and our extensive intellectual property portfolio is used in applications and products that enable a premium viewing experience in the theatre, the home and elsewhere.
RealD was founded in 2003 and has offices in Beverly Hills, California; Boulder, Colorado; London, United Kingdom; Moscow, Russia; Shanghai, China; Hong Kong; and Tokyo, Japan . For more information, please visit our website at www.reald.com .
